revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Hope |image = [[File:Ruins of Hope.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Ruins of Hope. |tokens = 1,200,000 |location = Northeast of Poni Breaker Coast }}
<!--T:2--> '''Ruins of Hope''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Alola]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 5x5 in size, respectively; including 15 chest tiles, 36 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 16,435,490 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
